name: GW2 Wiki Content Driven remix
description:
Improved user experience for GW2 official Wiki.

- DARK THEME!!! (optional)
- Hiden non-content related stuff.
- Better UX for maps!
- Search field, Quick info box and Table of Contents always accessible.
- No more old ugly-blue links.
additional_info:
v0.5
 - Dark Theme!

 - Fixed quick info box being that small
 - Fixed interactive maps getting in the way
 - Other small fixes

v0.4
 - Updater header to match PoF.
v0.3
 - Updated header to match HoT.
 - Fixed quick info box, not displaying or hiding elements.
 - Fixed quick info box always displaying scroll bars.
 - Got rid of the collapsible feature because it caused more harm than good.

v0.2
 - Fixed a problem with the menu (table of contents) that rendered it intrusive and really anoying on some cases.
 - Collapsible tables are now collapsed by default. No more kilometric scrolls to reach your content. Mouse over to expand your choice.

v0.1
 - 1st release.

style_setting_options.label: Nope, only the other UX features
style_setting_options.value:
/*Nothing more here because YOU didn't wanted the dark theme*/
.somerandomclass {display:none}

style_setting_options.label: Yup! please =D
